original_title: Expedition Svalbard: Part 1 - Hornsund to Bear Island
overview: A short film produced during a photographic expedition of the Svalbard Archipelago. It takes the natural highlights of the expedition and includes Bråsvellbreen, Storøya, Alkefjellet, polar bears, walrus, and phenomenal seabird colonies.
title: Expedition Svalbard: Part 1 - Hornsund to Bear Island
